all_text_content:
Verse of the Day
But out of respect or reverence to the name of the Supreme Being, to avoid the too frequent repetition of his name, they, the church, in ancient days, called that priesthood after Melchizedek, or the Melchizedek Priesthood.
Doctrine and Covenants 107:4
Quote of the Day
"Every child of Heavenly Father who has chosen to enter through the gate of baptism is under covenant to be a witness of the Savior."
President Henry B. Eyring | 1 Apr 2025General Conference
